mapper.insert: INSERT INTO match ( match_no, play_date, play_time, ground_name, max_player_no, fee ) VALUES ( SEQ_MATCH.nextval, #{playDate}, #{playTime}, #{groundName}, #{maxPlayerNo}, #{fee} )
INSERT INTO players ( player_no, parents_match_no, player_name , payment ) VALUES ( SEQ_player.nextval, #{parentsMatchNo}, #{playerName} , #{payment} )
